snippet: Hamas’s political leader vowed to build an Islamic Palestinian state on all the land of Israel, the West Bank and the Gaza Strip.
abstract: Khaled Meshal, political leader of Hamas, gives defiant speech vowing to build Islamic Palestinian state on all the land of Israel, West Bank and Gaza Strip; speech is given to celebrate 25th anniversary of founding of Hamas.
lead_paragraph: Hamas’s political leader vowed to build an Islamic Palestinian state on all the land of Israel, the West Bank and the Gaza Strip.

headline.seo: Khaled Meshal, Hamas Leader, Delivers Defiant Speech at Anniversary Celebration
headline.main:
Leader Celebrates
Founding of Hamas
With Defiant Speech
headline.print_headline: Leader of Hamas Delivers Defiant Speech at Anniversary Celebration
